text: Choose the correct statement from the following:

options.a: A stamen consists of two parts: the anther and the filament.
options.b: Stamen is not an essential part of a flower.
options.c: The filament carries the pollen grains.
options.d: The stamen is part of the accessory floral whorls.

hint: A stamen is composed of an anther and a filament, which are essential parts of the male reproductive organ.
